analysis.description:
EssentiaToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/30/0x6fcc9f9a805b87afee2786293cbdc954b1aba4e3.sol#99-100) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x6fcc9f9a805b87afee2786293cbdc954b1aba4e3.sol#205-217)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x6fcc9f9a805b87afee2786293cbdc954b1aba4e3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0x6fcc9f9a805b87afee2786293cbdc954b1aba4e3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x6fcc9f9a805b87afee2786293cbdc954b1aba4e3.sol#76-77) is not in mixedCase
